amendment.description: To limit the permit fees for cabins and trailers on land administered by the Dakotas Area Office of the Bureau of Reclamation and to allow trailer area permittees at Heart Butte Dam and Reservoir (Lake Tschida) to continue using trailer homes on their permitted lots.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5074 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5074 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5742-5743) To limit the permit fees for cabins and trailers on land administered by the Dakotas Area Office of the Bureau of Reclamation and to allow trailer area permittees at Heart Butte Dam and Reservoir (Lake Tschida) to continue using trailer homes on their permitted lots.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5074 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 4979.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5074 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
